title: How to Automate a Product Hunt Launch - Lessons from Helicone's Success
title1: How to Automate a Product Hunt Launch
title2: How to Automate a Product Hunt Launch
description: Learn how to streamline and automate your Product Hunt launch to increase your chances of becoming Product of the Day. Discover key strategies for automating user emails, social media content, and DM campaigns, based on Helicone's experience becoming Product of the Day.
author: Cole Gottdank
